div.div: at Waterville, ME | Harold Alfond Stad.

tr.td: Colby wins the toss and elected to differ
Change of possession, COL ball on COL30, 1st and 10.
J. Scheepers kickoff 61 yards to the BAT9, S. Hild return 29 yards to the BAT38.

M. Jackson rush for loss of 3 yards to the BAT39 (H. Nelson).
